lead_paragraph: Nikolay Davydenko of Russia, the defending champion, beat Andrei Pavel of Romania, 6-0, 6-3, yesterday in the final of the Hypo Group tournament in Pörtschach, Austria. Davydenko, 24, earned his sixth career title in winning the outdoor tournament on clay.
